summary: Alex Ovechkin, the 39-year-old captain of the Washington Capitals, scored his 890th career goal in a game against the Buffalo Sabres, moving him within five goals of surpassing Wayne Gretzky's NHL record. summary: Hyo Joo Kim won the Ford Championship at Whirlwind Golf Club, securing her seventh LPGA victory. She overcame a four-shot deficit by shooting an 8-under 64, leading to a playoff. title: Watch These S&P 500 Chart Levels as More Tariffs Loom
snippets: The S&P 500 experienced a decline last week, marking losses in five of the past six weeks due to concerns about tariffs and a potential economic recession. The index fell 2% on Friday, trading 9% below its record high from last month. Technical analysis highlights a breakdown below a flag pattern, indicating possible further declines. Investors are advised to watch support levels at 5,445 and 5,260, and resistance levels at 5,875 and 6,090. This movement comes amid volatility related to new tariffs expected and concerns over inflation and economic growth stalling.
summary: The S&P 500 fell 2% on Friday, marking its fifth loss in six weeks, driven by concerns over tariffs and fears of a recession. It is now 9% below its record high from last month. Technical analysis suggests potential further declines, with key support at 5,445 and 5,260 and resistance at 5,875 and 6,090. The downturn is amid volatility from expected new tariffs and worries about inflation and economic growth.
